title: Entertaining, informational and fun to watch with great acting
review: Entertaining, informational and fun to watch with great acting. I am sure this will be nominated for a lot of stuff. At two and half hours I just got bored with it.

title: Maybe R next time
review: This film uses every scare tactic in the book and it last for 90 min. When doing this you should shoot for an R rating then.

title: Very weird, strange but an interesting film.
review: Very weird, strange but an interesting film worth checking out.

title: almost if not as good as the original.
review: A little long in parts but great science fiction film that was almost if not as good as the original.

title: The Scout 2?
review: Rich rude guy needs money so he finds baseball players in India and risk his career to bring them to America. Meanwhile Lake Bell calls him out for being a rude asshole then he becomes super nice guy and everyone is happy. Moral of the story rich people be nicer.

title: Day and the life
review: I get the whole history of this event but I didn't find this film that entertaining.

title: ballet is very hard and painful.
review: Darren Aronofsky does a lot of drugs I get it and ballet is very hard and painful.

title: beautiful landscapes
review: Excellent story and beautiful landscapes makes this film a must watch.

movie_title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
title: Best teen film in a long time
review: Best teen film in a long time. John Hughes would have been proud.

title: Start guessing
review: Great movie that keeps you wondering the entire time. The 3 actors in this were great.

title: GUNS, GUNS & More GUNS
review: Entertaining to watch but a little over the top. These people can't be that smart and stupid at the same time

title: On Par with the rest of the Marvel Universe
review: Solid entry in the Iron Man series. A lot better then the last one but still not up to par on the first one. Tons of action and good dialog.

title: Excellent adaptation
review: Excellent adaptation from the King novel. Not so much scary but more eerie at times.

title: Over the top
review: Interesting horror film. In the beginning it just drags out and then has a couple of WOW moments and then by the end you are asking yourself what is really going on. It's not for everyone but is entertaining to watch.

title: Tells the story
review: I was expecting more from a Kathryn Bigelow film but this still hit the mark and was entertaining. It did have some interesting inside on what happened on that night in Detroit.

title: A man and his dog
review: A man kills tons of people because they took his dog. Non-stop action that has the most recycled script but it works really well.

title: Masterpiece
review: Excellent film from beginning to end and not your typical love story

title: For the History Buff
review: I am not a huge history buff so this film did not interest me to much but it does have some good acting and climatic scenes. Most of this film is a bunch of old men talking about how great they are.

title: Another Masterpiece
review: Brilliant story telling (re-telling) of the story of Hitler. Waltz couldn't have played his part any better.

title: Girl Power
review: Fun and entertaining but not much more. I did enjoy the 90s' themes.

title: Hilarious
review: This movie has no plot, no story, no real ending and goes on with random things happening throughout that have no connection with anything else in the movie. On the other side you will not stop laughing the entire time and the actors playing themselves works really well.

title: Very sad and depressing but great
review: Very sad and depressing film but worth checking out. The acting was brilliant and another solid Richard Linklater film not to be missed.

title: One of the best of the Year.
review: One of the best movies so far this year. Very well written and acted with a surprising ending that makes you laugh out loud.

title: One of the rare movies that still has shock factor
review: One of the rare movies that still has shock factor. Most scenes were 'I didn't see that coming.' Very gory and disturbing but very entertaining.

title: One of the best of 2019
review: Great horror film with a nice twist at the end. Also, a great film to discuss after the fact. Also featured a lot of nostalgia from older 80s' films.

title: Talking Bear need I say more
review: Brilliant a smoking, drinking, talking teddy bear. There was no way Seth MacFarlane could mess this up.

title: Great who dont it film
review: Very fun who done it film just like you would expect. Great cast and a lot of good twist. Some you can see coming others you don't.

title: Very Long
review: Everyone is saying this film was way to long and I do agree with them. The de-aging did not work since all it did was remove the wrinkles in the old men. It was nice to see Pesci back again. The story seemed like something I have seen over and over again but I still enjoyed it. You will get the 3 and half hours you expect.

title: Great visual effects
review: Great visual effects and the film looked really nice and had a decent story but I am not sure about this one.

title: Interesting prospective of one persons interpretation to porn.
review: Interesting prospective of one persons interpretation to porn.

title: Non Stop Action
review: Excellent R rated action movie that just does not stop with the movie references.

title: This format works really well for this film
review: I am not the biggest fan of the comic book movie genre but this one had enough solid laughs and action to actually work. Even if it is about some dude flying around with his hammer half the film.

title: Fun adventure film
review: Fun adventure film with a lot of pop culture references.

title: Well made in every aspect
review: I did watch this move on film in 70 mm so that might have added to enjoyment. Overall a very good dialog driven movie.

title: Tabloids
review: Solid portray of the Tonya Harding story. Some great acting as well. To this day we still can not confirm anyone's involvement in the case. Everyone still openly denies any.

title: Chastain is brilliant
review: Interesting story that is a lot more than just some illegal poker games. It has great acting and digs deep into the politics in our society on many different levels. There has been a lot of power driven women films released this year but this one is at the top of its game.

title: One of the best films of the year.
review: One of the best films of the year. Captures the ambiance of the decade with great acting, writing and directing.

title: Not just another Marvel Film
review: Solid fun teen / Marvel/ action film. This is what all the other Spider-Man films should be like.

title: Not Disappointed
review: Part 6 does not disappoint. More action then ever. If you added Bruce Willis this could have been Die Hard 6

title: Great cast and story line
review: Great cast and story line but could have had more laughs. I mean really Charlie Day was in this and he even played the character from It's Always Sunny just a different name.

title: Action after action
review: Action after action but nothing new here. I can see why people love this and hate it. I am on the hate side.

title: Another great Nolan film.
review: Another great Nolan film. This is a good version of Gravity. In the end you are like what did I just watch.

title: Brilliant
review: Excellent film that takes a small problem and makes a great movie about it.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
title: Everything you would expect
review: First film I saw in 4DX and it might be the last. Getting water splashed on your face and gust of winds do not seem like something extra to pay for when you watch a film. Over all the film was what I would have expected not being a huge Star Wars fan. I however enjoyed seeing Carrie Fisher brought back to life for one last film. For the big Star War fans I am sure they will love the final of this trilogy.

title: 160 Kills
review: A man kills 160 people and gets feel good movie about him. As long as you get past that you film is enjoyable.

title: Little on the long side
review: Decent film with another great performance from Dev Patel but I think this movie was to long. While the story was compelling and true I could have just read this as an article and gotten most the details.

title: Tiny Ants
review: This movie sounded a lot better then most of the comic book movies but it turnout to be the same as the rest. Oh and they also had a crossover. Big surprise.

title: Some funny scenes
review: I went in with high hopes and was let down. Had some funny scenes. Jonah Hill dressed as Peter Pan and being chased by drug dealers.

title: David Russell has done better
review: Was overall a good movie I just expected more from a David Russell movie.

title: Gyllenhaal at his best
review: Great film. As the movie goes on it just gets creepier and creepier. If you thought Gyllenhaal couldn't get any weirder then Donnie Darko you were wrong.

title: It Pops
review: Entertaining but sometimes a little over the top. Does have a decent amount of laugh out loud scenes.

title: Okay sci-fi movie
review: Okay sci-fi movie that is a little predictable. May have been better without Tom Cruise.

title: PG-13? Why?
review: Fun to watch but more of a concert than a documentary.

title: Best car chase/ heist film in MANY years
review: Arguably one of the best films so far this year. Its like watching a Fast and Furious movie with a great soundtrack and a plot that is realistic.

title: Wasn't the worst super hero
review: Wasn't the worst super hero film ever but needs a lot of work to be considered a solid one. We can start by getting a new actor to play Batman.

title: I really enjoyed this film.
review: Maybe because I like baseball or saw to many negative reviews but I really enjoyed this film.

title: Another M. Night Shyamaian solid film
review: Another M. Night Shyamaian movie with his normal twist ending, This movie provides horror, suspense, mystery and creepiness with a great James McAvoy performance.

title: Scorsese' can do anything
review: Great movie. In the year of The Artist winning all the awards this will get over looked for now.

title: Another Spiderman-Man film
review: I guess I get this but do we need to keep making the same film over and over again with a new twist? It's fun and entertaining but not for me.

title: Great movie should have won best picture.
review: These 2 actors click and this film is almost perfect. It has sports and romance. Something for everyone. The should have won best picture.

movie_title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
title: A lot going on
review: So many things going on in this movies I had to read a wiki on it to figure everything out.

title: Same Plot Again
review: Another movie everyone in the world loves. I get it they need to get the disk and save everyone.

title: What elese to expect from Nolan
review: The film was made by the score that put you right into the war with the actors playing the roles. I wish this had more of a story then trying just to get as many people out of Dunkirk as possible. The 3 different story lines (air, water and land) made the film a lot different then any other war film you can watch. This was Nolan's way of putting you into the war. It did work really well.

title: Same old dick and fart jokes
review: Should have been more raunchy then it was. Had some funny scenes but nothing new but the same old dick and fart jokes.

title: Charlie Day and Will Arnett were wonderful
review: A little overrated from the hype. Charlie Day and Will Arnett were wonderful and made the entire movie.

title: Stifler at his best
review: Comedy, Action and Stifler you can't go wrong with this hockey film.

title: Oceans 11 meets Illusionist
review: Oceans 11 meets Illusionist. More of a heist movie then a Illusionist movie but it will keep you entertained throughout. The 3rd and final act did not live up to the exceptions that the characters wanted you to think.

title: Another okay horror movie.
review: Another okay horror movie. Not sure what the hype is all about. Just another hunted house horror movie.

title: Excellent portrait of the aftermath of Nov. 22 1963
review: Excellent portrait of the aftermath of Nov. 22 1963 through the eyes of Jackie Kennedy. This film has an eerie score similar to The Shining that keeps you in check about the subject matter that is being presented.

title: Kevin Kline was funny
review: Ashton Kutcher is really annoying in this and Natalie Portman's character has no back story about why she does not like relationships but Kevin Kline was funny.

title: Combine Richard Curtis & Danny Boyle and you profection
review: Great writing from Richard Curtis as always. This Rom-com had a unique story and great acting. Directed by the great Danny Boyle that shows us again he can make any type of genre film and it always works.

title: Less Woody and Spork would have been better
review: The other Toy Story films were a lot better. This one was to much about Woody and the spork thing.

title: raunchy
review: Another really smart film from Jude Apatow that way to over raunchy in a great way.

title: Non=Stop action
review: Another decent Liam Neeson action movie worth checking out. This time he is on a plane kicking ass.

title: I am a Wes Anderson fan but
review: I normally like Wes Anderson films but I think I missed something in this one. It had some laughs.

title: Tom Cruise is getting old
review: Tom Cruise is getting old and I guess that's why they added Jeremy Renner to the mix. This to me is just another action film.

title: Steve Carell does a great job of being eerie in this film.
review: Steve Carell does a great job of being eerie in this film.

title: Best horror film in a long time.
review: Excellent horror movie. We do not 9 sequels of this movie.

movie_title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
title: Great reboot
review: For some reason I like these apes movies. Hopefully they make a sequel the ending makes you want more.

title: Just like the rest
review: Okay comic book film that is a 3 hour lead up to the next one.

movie_title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
title: Everything going for it but fell short
review: Solid look in the late 60s' film scene with great acting, dialog, cinematography, humor, action and more. The biggest issue with the film was the lack of story and the huge build up that you are waiting to see. One of the rare Tarantino films I will not be watching again.

title: Good movie just not up to par with Tarantino's other films.
review: Good movie just not up to par with Tarantino's other films. Lots of great acting, dialog and story that keeps the film flowing.

title: At it's best
review: I never found Jordan Peele comedy that appealing but he has made a solid film with a lot of good scares with smart story.

title: Drive is worth the watch
review: Great movie. Its nice to watch a movie that actually has good acting and a script that isn't a remake.

title: Shocking? no
review: The kid is haunted and not the house. It says it right on the movie poster. Why was this supposed to be a shock to the audience?

title: Disturbing and great film making.
review: Disturbing and great film making. Might be hard you some people to watch.

movie_title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
title: Not your ordinary adventure movie
review: Beginning of the movie was dragging a lot but it did get a lot better as it went on and turned out to be a decent movie. Not your ordinary adventure movie something a little more.

title: The best film of 2018.
review: The best film of 2018. The quietness of the film adds to the intensity of the aliens. After watching this you will have lot of questions and that just adds to it.

title: Needed a better plot
review: Some good twist but still needed a better plot. But you can never go wrong with a Liam Neeson action film.

title: Oscars all over it
review: The subject matter to this film did not interest me to much but the cinematography of Italy and the acting made this worth watching alone.

title: A great Sci-Fi film.
review: Interesting take that makes sense. A great Sci-Fi film.

title: A great story
review: A great story that should have been told a long time ago.

title: Pixar at its best
review: Very fun and entertaining Pixar film about the dead people.

title: Looks and sounds great
review: Solid World War 1 film that looks great and has some great acting.

title: marshmallow man
review: Nice to see the marshmallow man getting work again. I think its been 30 years.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi
title: The Last Jedi was the same
review: Another solid Star Wars film that seems to me seems like it is just telling the same story over again with newer special effect and different actors.

title: Did wer need this?
review: This was like watching a blood bath that really did not go anywhere. But if you are a fan of the original then you will probably be okay with this one.

title: Please stop
review: So why was this not billed as a remake? Is there anything else we need to know about this island.

title: More Sci-Fi please
review: I think if they went more sci-fi and less of a love story the film could have been even better.

title: Was this remake
review: Same formula as the original but not as much shock value since we already seen them do all the same stuff. Still will make you laugh.

title: Best X-Men Yet
review: If you are going to make a comic book movie from what I have seen it better be rated R. I think all the blood and guts made this film so likable.

title: Same
review: This movie had good special effect and visually nice to look at. It also had a lot of superheros.

title: Predictable
review: Funny and entertaining but way to predictable. Very typical boy meets girl movie.

title: Shock Factor works well here
review: Ari Aster once again changes the horror genre to something with a more shock value then traditional screams. Some stuff is over the top and other stuff is hard to not look away. This film is not for everyone.

title: The silent film idea was great.
review: The silent film idea was great. But Hollywood needs to learn that the only people who like movies about Hollywood are the people that live in Hollywood. Hence this movie did not make...

title: Better than just a musical
review: Was expecting another boring musical but it turns out that La La Land was a good romantic drama/ comedy. This film had great acting and cinematography. How it mixed a 50's ambiance with modern day was brilliant. It also does not follow ALL the standard romantic clich√©s that movies normally do.

title: Goonies meets Close Encounters of the Third Kind
review: They should make more movies like this. It was a modern day Goonies meets Close Encounters of the Third Kind.

title: Clever
review: Clever horror movie that keeps you looking over your shoulder. Very scary to boot.

title: Watch for Shock Factor
review: The story telling was okay but the issues it brought up were mind blowing. Worth checking out.

title: Good story and premise
review: Good story and premise but the ending was a little on the weaker side and a lot of unanswered questions.

title: Blind vs Stupidity
review: Blind vs Stupidity. Excellent horror movie that seems to realistic with a lot of suspense.

title: Kids will love
review: Solid take on a story that has been made so many times over it just gets old.

title: Best Pictures
review: Wonderful original love story where the 2 leads can't even talk to one another. This film will have you thinking what will happen next

title: The Room
review: Entertaining and funny and does do some justice for The Room.

title: Entertaining story
review: Entertaining story and the fact that half this film is made up and this person just a drug smuggler makes think why Doug Liman wants to glamorize this this character.

title: Not for everyone
review: For some reason I did not get this one. Most people seem to like it.

title: Why is everyone yelling all the time?
review: Why is everyone yelling all the time? Maybe to make this film look better?

title: Simple but great story
review: A simple story of a black family working with a white family that works really works with the great directing of Ress and some some outstanding acting performances.

title: I get the point
review: Vulgar, disgusting, hilarious and brilliant all rolled into one.

title: Brilliant
review: Great dark origin story with some of the best acting of the year. The whole film was like an introduction to all the Batman films that have been make the last 40 or so year.

title: JK Simmons does a great job of being an asshole
review: JK Simmons does a great job of being an asshole. In my opinion that was the only thing I liked about the film. Most people are raving about this but I must have missed the mark.

title: Comedy?
review: Interesting comedy on someone who stole millions of dollars from hard working people.

title: Great follow up
review: With the success of the first one there is no way this one could have topped it but this is still a solid follow to the original. Had just as much thrills and creepiness. The film could have been shortened by about 45 minutes.

title: Drunk Superhero
review: What more do you want them a drink Superhero. Interesting spin and had some laughs.

title: Finally a GREAT remake
review: Well written, beautifully acted and some of the best cinematography I have seen all year. A great adaptation of an older novel that a new generation can experience.

title: Aliens with a plot
review: Not your typical take on another alien invasion film. This movie had drama and a solid story to back everything up. Amy Adams and Jeremy Renner give sold performances.

title: Parasite is only the beginning
review: This film has it all comedy, drama, horror and anything else you can squeeze out of it. It works really well. Four characters that literally take over another families life.

title: A comedy that becomes a nightmare
review: This film plays like a comedy that becomes a nightmare and the entire time the audience wants to look away. But the truth is in the numbers.

title: Girl Power I guess
review: For some reason this one did not work for me. More like watching a war movie then a super hero movie.

title: Getting some great reviews
review: This film was enjoyable and very depressing as most reviews would say. This film is about the aftermath of a marriage and not a story about a marriage. The acting is brilliant and the story is entertaining. If you have ever lived through a divorce this film would a lot more impactful to the viewer. I have not but watching this is just a 2 plus hour argument of a divorcing couple. The acting and story felt very authentic with the help of the two leads. In the end the two main characters did not really change and during the course of the film the viewer had no idea who to root for. They both like everyone in the world had flaws with ups and downs but in the end after it all the conclusion was to just spend all their money to fight for their son. Where two fight for their son or just ego? I guess that is for the audience to figure out.

title: Remake
review: This could have been better but did not live up to the first one.

title: Okay Marvel comic book film but a little to political
review: Okay Marvel comic book film but a little to political for my taste. It's more like Star Wars meets The Patriot. Maybe if this had some more action then just fighting for the King title it would have been more interesting.

movie_title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
title: What? Ben?
review: Zack Snyder look to this movie was really good but Ben Affleck as Batman did not work. What was the deal with his weird voice?

title: Great Music
review: Excellent film. Worth checking out. Best feel good film in year with great music

title: Adult version of Mary Poppins
review: I Felt like I watching an old person movie with a mean old lady.

title: Not sure about the subject matter
review: This was entertaining but the subject matter was not easy to laugh at.

title: Another great Wes Anderson film
review: Another great Wes Anderson film. This one is just as simple as the rest of his films but just as good.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
title: Yep Star Wars
review: Decent action movie but I guess if you are a huge Star Wars fan you thought this was the best thing since Jedi. To me they all feel kind of the same and there isn't much difference here.

title: Amazing movie
review: Amazing movie. Robert Zemeckis needs to make more movies.

title: Great concept
review: Great concept and some good horror scenes but at 90 min it fell short. This film should have been longer and had more character development. I am still wanting to know who these people are Purging and why? I am sure all these questions will be answered in 5 direct to video sequel this film will get. This looks like another 'Butterfly Effect'.

title: The shock factor and originality is gone.
review: I guess we are going to see how long we can drag these movies out now. Was not up to par with the original one. The shock factor and originality is gone.

title: Better then the one from 1998
review: Better then the one from 1998. if that says anything.

title: Another weird alien movie
review: Another weird alien movie that doesn't really live up to exceptions. Did have a great ending.

title: Better than expected
review: Not as bad I would have thought but I had very LOW expectations.

title: Finally an R rated one that focus on a life of a super hero
review: Best comic movie in a long time. Finally an R rated one that focus on a life of a super hero rather then what good they can do. Similar to Kick-Ass and probably as good.

title: ACTION and lots of it
review: Did not expect this to be so smart, funny, bloody and great. Samuel L. Jackson is great in this film. I was expecting some boring normal spy movie and that is not what I got.

title: Funny but the same thing as Part 1
review: Same formula as the original but not as much shock value since we already seen them do all the same stuff. Still will make you laugh.

title: Should have been better
review: I enjoyed the other ones but for some reason this was just like a heist movie. The film needed more car chases and less how do we get by this obstacle.

title: Interesting sci-fi film
review: Interesting sci-fi film that keeps you thinking long after you view it.

title: Same old Solid Pixar stuff
review: Had some funny moments and worth checking out. Everything you would expect from a Pixar feature.

title: Good idea for a horror movie
review: Good idea for a horror movie but I think the other aspect of the film needed some work. This movie had more potential then it showed us on the screen

title: Buddy Comedies are BACK
review: Has some good raunchy moments definitely the best buddy comedy in a while. The 70's era adds a lot to the film. Gosling is spot on with his stupid but smart mentality and Crowe plays a great tough-guy asshole perfectly. He may have been born to play that role.

title: That is it just all action.
review: All action. That is it just all action. No plot, story or character development. It worked

title: Mel Gibson is back for now
review: Disturbing war film about love, family and forgiveness. Maybe this will spark the return of Mel Gibson

title: Great story that has been retold many times
review: Surprisingly a lot better then I thought. This proves that Baz Luhrmann is a great director.

title: Expected better
review: Thought this movie was going to be good but it turned out to be really bad

title: Another great performance from Tom Hanks.
review: Another great Clint Eastwood film and another great performance from Tom Hanks.

title: Overrated
review: Maybe I had to high expectations but this is just another search and rescue movie that follows every single rule with the Hollywood ending.

title: Not one of the good ones.
review: Action scenes were really great and completely unrealistic as you would have expected but the one-liners and story was awful.
